Audio.name: Music Volume
Audio.description: Adjusts the volume of background music.

Audio.name: SFX Volume
Audio.description: Adjusts the volume of sound effects.

Audio.name: Master Volume
Audio.trollDescription: Determines how loud The Master from Beat Saber OST 7 should speak.

Audio.name: Remove Pitch Compensation
Audio.description: Makes it so that song speed affects pitch.

Video.name: Toggle Fullscreen
Video.description: Toggles between fullscreen (on) and windowed (off) mode.

Video.name: Framerate Limit
Video.description: Limits the frame rate of the game (gameplay only).

Graphics & Performance.name: Quality
Graphics & Performance.description: Changes the influence quality has over performance in the game. Lowest = performance/quality, highest = quality/performance

Menu.name: Menu Theme
Menu.description: Changes the theme of certain menus.

Menu.name: Menu Color Scheme
Menu.description: Changes the color scheme of certain menus.

Miscellanous.name: FPS Counter
Miscellanous.description: Displays the current frames per second (FPS) on-screen.
Miscellanous.trollDescription: Displays a low-quality (regardless of set quality) JPEG image of Emperor FPS from the UTTP.

Miscellanous.name: Troll Messages
Miscellanous.description: Displays random troll messages throughout the game for fun.
Miscellanous.trollDescription: Seeing weird messages? Try disabling this option! üòú

Miscellanous.name: Language
Miscellanous.description: Changes the language of the game.
